abstract: The concept of submodularity plays a vital role in com- binatorial optimization. In particular, many impor- tant optimization problems can be cast as submodu- lar maximization problems, including maximum cov- erage, maximum facility location and max cut in di- rected/undirected graphs. In this paper we present the flrst known approxima- tion algorithms for the problem of maximizing a non- decreasing submodular set function subject to multiple linear constraints.
